com.efurture.kite
Class Kite

java.lang.Object
  com.efurture.kite.Kite

public class Kite
extends Object

give you powerful layout extension via android:tag or android:contentDescription attribute.

Demo Usage:

<View android:id="@+id/textview" android:contentDescription='{"height":"width*0.333 + 2*66 + 0.5*screen_width"}'/>

<View android:id="@+id/view" android:tag='{"height":"width*0.333 + 2*66 + 0.5*screen_width"}'/>

make layout effect via Kite:

Kite.layout(findViewById(R.id.view));

Author:
gubaojian email: gubaojian@163.com
